ja483:5.4: maccamupabbajanti → maccumupabbajanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1); maccumupapajjanti (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja483:15.4: hañño mama pāṇado yo → hañño yo mamapāṇadassa (bj, pts-vp-pli1); haññe mama pāṇadassa (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja483:17.2: Rajjaṁ imaṁ dhammaguṇe → rajjampimaṁ cassa gaṇe (mr)
ja483:18.2: yācayogo bhavitvā → pāhunake karitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed); yācayogo viditvā (mr)
